Young Kiwi musician Samuel Bronnimann dies in UK after allegedly taking unidentified pills https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/young-kiwi-musician-samuel-bronnimann-dies-in-uk-after-allegedly-takeing-unidentified-pills/HQUAP2LXV5GZDMB3QX4TLSLFLQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/young-kiwi-musician-samuel-bronnimann-dies-in-uk-after-allegedly-takeing-unidentified-pills/HQUAP2LXV5GZDMB3QX4TLSLFLQ/ The young musician had been living in the United Kingdom for over a year. Mon, 02 Dec 2024 05:08:07 +0000 Samuel Bronnimann, 25 from Whanganui, died in the United Kingdom last month after allegedly taking unidentified pills.

Fake gasfitter John Arthur faces $8000 fine for risking lives in Whangārei https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/fake-gasfitter-john-arthur-faces-8000-fine-for-risking-lives-in-whangarei/DTGHRDJ6G5FSZPZQG3IVIGU5UU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/fake-gasfitter-john-arthur-faces-8000-fine-for-risking-lives-in-whangarei/DTGHRDJ6G5FSZPZQG3IVIGU5UU/ Shannon PitmanJohn Arthur used fake ID to pose as a gasfitter for people with boats and motorhomes. Dementia danger: Where you live in NZ could be worsening your brain health https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dementia-danger-where-you-live-in-nz-could-be-worsening-your-brain-health/VR72DXMQPBDEXA7AB5WB4TOW2A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dementia-danger-where-you-live-in-nz-could-be-worsening-your-brain-health/VR72DXMQPBDEXA7AB5WB4TOW2A/ Jamie MortonWhere we live in NZ can raise our risk of cognitive decline – with poorer areas worse off. Sun, 01 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Cases of dementia are projected to jump from around 70,000 today to at least 170,000 by 2050, with the associated economic toll similarly soaring from $2.5 billion to $5.9b.
